column4: I try to boot my machine and get Grub error 17, how can I reconfigure it to see/boot ubuntu/vista?
did you boot to windows for the first time and that happened?
this happened to me this morning, download supergrub
boot to the supergrub cd and reinstall grub...via the command line instructions at the website
google supergrub
I don't know the exact website...it's a long url
you can burn a CD under live cd...i did exactly this this morning
sure
you really should be able to burn a CD
burn the CD, reboot, eject CD while it's booting, insert supergrub cd
I was afk, were you not able to do it?
where are you in the process?
Are you there?
Do you have google talk?
If you install google talk I'll help you out.
Or I'll just help ou here
are you there?
You're booted to the live CD, right?
put my nick in front of your replies so that it's easier on my eyes, ok?
ok.
Were you able to burn supergrub to a cd?
reboot the machine...while it is rebooting, eject the cd
